source_string:
The type of "accurate placement protocol" to use.
- Auto: Uses v3 in single player, and by default Slabs-only in multiplayer,
  unless the server has Carpet mod that sends a 'carpet:hello'
  packet, in which case v2 is used on that server.
- Version 3: Supported by Tweakeroo itself (in single player) or with Servux.
- Version 2: Compatible with servers with the Carpet mod
  (either QuickCarpet by skyrising and DeadlyMC,
  or CarpetExtra in addition to FabricCarpet.
  And in both cases the 'accurateBlockPlacement' Carpet rule needs
  to be enabled on the server).
- Slabs only: Only fixes top slabs. Compatible with Paper servers.
- None: Does not modify coordinates.
translation:
要使用的[精确放置协议]类型. 
- 自动: 在单人游戏中使用v3, 默认在多人游戏中使用Slabs only, 
除非服务器有发送 'carpet:hello' 数据包的Carpet模组,
在这种情况下, 该服务器上将使用v2. 
- Version 3: 由Tweakeroo本身支持(在单人游戏中)或与Servux一起使用. 
- Version2: 与具有Carpet模组的服务器兼容
(包括skyrising和DeadlyMC的QuickCarpet, 
或者在FabricCarpet基础上增加CarpetExtra. 
在这两种情况下, 服务器都需要启用 'accurateBlockPlacement' Carpet规则). 
- Slabs only: 只修正顶部半砖. 与Paper服务器兼容. 
- 关闭: 不进行修正

source_string:
Bypass the new distance/coordinate check that was added in 1.18.2.

That check breaks the "accurate placement protocol" and causes
any blocks placed with a rotation (or other property) request to just become ghost blocks.

There is basically no need to ever disable this.
The check didn't even exist ever before 1.18.2.
translation:
该功能绕过了1.18.2中新添加的距离/坐标校验. 

该校验破坏了§6[精确放置协议]§f的功能
并导致任何带有旋转(或其他属性)
请求放置的方块变成了幽灵方块
基本上没有必要禁用这个校验. 
因为在1.18.2之前, 这个校验甚至都不存在

source_string:
Custom flat world preset strings.
These are in the format: name;blocks_string;biome;generation_features;icon_item
The blocks string format is the vanilla format, such as: 62*minecraft:dirt,minecraft:grass
The biome can be the registry name, or the int ID
The icon item name format is minecraft:iron_nugget

自定义世界预设. 格式为: 
名称;方块类型;生物群系;地形;图标(使用英文符号).

生物群系可以使用数字ID或文字格式, 图标请使用原版格式, 如: minecraft:iron_nugget

source_string:
Disables chunk (re-)rendering. This will make any block changes non-visible
until this is disabled again and F3 + A is used to refresh the world rendering.
This might help with low fps in places with lots of block changes in some situations,
where the block changes are not really relevant at that time.
translation:
禁用区块渲染, 这会导致所有方块不可见. 
恢复渲染需要在禁用此功能后使用 F3 + A 重新渲染世界. 
这可能会让你在大量方块改变时拥有不那么低的帧数

禁用客户端中除了玩家外所有实体的更新. 
当你需要去处理实体过多环境下的情况时, 使用这个可以降低客户端的渲染压力

FlexibleBlock | 方块灵活放置(棱角)
FlexibleBlock | 方块灵活放置(旋转)

source_string:
The key to activate the accurate block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block facing
into the clicked block face
translation: 激活精确放置的快捷键, 使用后方块将放置于点击的块面上

source_string:
The key to activate the accurate block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block facing
the opposite way from what it would be otherwise
translation: 激活精确放置的快捷键, 使用后方块将反向放置于点击的块面上

source_string: Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Column mode
translation: 将破坏范围限制在 当前直线

source_string: Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Diagonal mode
translation: 将破坏范围限制在 对角线

source_string: Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Face mode
translation: 将破坏范围限制在 面朝方向

source_string: Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Layer mode
translation: 将破坏范围限制在 同水平面上

source_string: Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Line mode
translation: 将破坏范围限制在  放置方块的棱边上

source_string: Switch the Breaking Restriction mode to the Plane mode
translation: 将破坏范围限制在 同平面上

source_string:
Copies the text from an already-placed sign.
That text can be used with the tweakSignCopy tweak.
translation: 开启后上一个告示牌中输入的文本将作为初始值输入至下一个告示牌

source_string:
The key to lock the current real player rotations, only allowing the
inputs (mouse) to affect separate "camera rotations" used only for the rendering
while this key is active.
Meant for freely looking down/around while elytra flying straight.
translation:
按住此快捷键会锁定玩家当前的视角方向, 
使玩家鼠标移动仅改变摄像机视角而不改变移动方向. 
应用此功能需要开启§6[工具] -> [环顾四周]§f
§b注: 非常适合你在鞘翅飞行时回头看§f

source_string:
The key to activate the flexible block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block in an adjacent position
translation: 按下以激活灵活放置模式, 按下该按键时可将方块放置在当前方块的 相邻 的位置

source_string:
The key to activate the flexible block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block in a
offset or diagonal position
translation: 按下以激活灵活放置模式, 按下该按键时可将方块放置在当前方块的 斜角或隔空 的位置

source_string:
The key to activate the flexible block placement
mode/overlay for placing the block with
a rotation/facing
translation:
按下以激活灵活放置模式, 按下该按键时可将方块以选定的方向放置. 
注: 要使此项功能能够正常使用, 
通常需要在服务器开启§6Carpet§f的§e精确放置协议§f的环境下
同时启用§6Tweakeroo§f的§e[精确放置协议]§f功能
切换至飞行速度预设1
切换至飞行速度预设2
切换至飞行速度预设3
切换至飞行速度预设4
用于切换§6[通用功能] -> [灵魂出窍玩家操作]§f功能的开启与关闭
用于切换§6[通用功能] -> [灵魂出窍玩家移动]§f功能的开启与关闭

source_string:
The key to hold to allow scrolling the hotbar
through the player inventory rows
translation: 按下快捷键时, 可以按行循环滚动物品栏

source_string: The base key to show the hotbar/inventory overlay
translation:
按下快捷键时, 将显示背包内容物.  
显示位置可在§6[通用功能] -> [背包显示位置]§f处更改

source_string: Swap the hotbar with the top-most inventory row
translation: 按下快捷键时, 将物品栏与背包顶层一行交换

source_string: Swap the hotbar with the middle inventory row
translation: 按下快捷键时, 将物品栏与背包中层一行交换

source_string: Swap the hotbar with the bottom-most inventory row
translation: 按下快捷键时, 将物品栏与背包底层一行交换

source_string:
The key to activate the inventory preview feature
§6Deprecated in favor of the 1.21+ MiniHUD version
translation:
按下快捷键时, 可预览容器内的物品.  
§c已弃用, 在1.21+版本的 MiniHUD 中已经实现了此功能§f

source_string: The key open the in-game config GUI
translation: 打开§6Tweakeroo§f配置界面的快捷键

source_string: The key to mirror the targeted y-position within the block
translation:
按下快捷键时, 将方块以Y轴镜像的方式放置出来. 
需要开启§6[工具] -> [Y轴镜像放置]§f

source_string: The key to activate the player inventory peek/preview feature
translation: 激活[玩家背包预览]功能的热键

source_string: Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Column mode
translation: 将快速放置的方块放置范围限制在 当前直线

source_string: Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Diagonal mode
translation:
将快速放置的方块放置范围限制在 对角线 
§6注意: 此功能无法凭空放置方块§f

source_string: Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Face mode
translation: 将快速放置的方块放置范围限制在 面朝方向

source_string: Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Layer mode
translation: 将快速放置的方块放置范围限制在 同水平面上

source_string: Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Line mode
translation: 将快速放置的方块放置范围限制在 放置方块的棱边上

source_string: Switch the Placement Restriction mode to the Plane mode
translation: 将快速放置的方块放置范围限制在 同平面上

source_string: Makes all nearby pets sit down
translation: 让附近所有的宠物坐下
开启此项后, 所有的渲染运算都会被跳过
开启此项后, 所有关于世界的渲染运算都会被跳过

source_string: Makes all nearby pets stand up
translation: 让附近所有的宠物站起

source_string: Swaps the currently equipped item in the chest slot between an Elytra and a Chest Plate
translation: 按下快捷键时, 更换胸部装备为鞘翅/胸甲

source_string: Toggles the value of the Generic -> 'accuratePlacementProtocol' option
translation: 切换§6[通用功能] -> [精确放置协议]§f 选项的值

source_string: Grabs or ungrabs the mouse cursor, depending on the current state
translation: 将鼠标从当前窗口切换到外部窗口, 在外部窗口的鼠标操作不影响游戏内操作

source_string: Switches to the effective tool for the targeted block
translation: 按下快捷键后切换到适合采集当前方块的工具

source_string:

translation:
将所有当前可用的地图作为图像写入到 
'config/tweakeroo/map images/<world name>/' 目录

source_string:
Enables a simpler version of Flexible placement, similar to
the Carpet mod, so basically either facing into or out
from the block face clicked on.
translation: 启用简化版的[灵活放置]功能, 类似于 Carpet 模组, 即朝向点击的方块面或背向该方块面进行方块放置

source_string:
Enables a "after clicker" tweak, which does automatic right
clicks on the just-placed block.
Useful for example for Repeaters (setting the delay).
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
translation:
启用该功能后, 它会对刚刚放置的方块快速右键一定次数, 
这在放置四挡中继器时非常有用. 
按住快捷键时滚动滚轮可以调整放置后右键的次数.

source_string:
Enables an aim lock, locking the yaw and pitch rotations
to the current values.
This is separate from the snap aim lock,
which locks them to the snapped value.
This allows locking them "freely" to the current value.
translation:
启用瞄准锁定, 将水平和俯仰旋转锁定到当前值. 
这与[瞄准辅助锁定]不同, 
后者将它们锁定到一个确定值. 
这项设置允许将它们"自由地"锁定到当前值

source_string:
Enables an "Angel Block" tweak, which allows
placing blocks in mid-air in Creative mode.
Powered by "Flotato" technology.
translation:
此功能将让你能够在空中放置方块. 
§6该功能仅在创造模式生效. §f
由 Flotato 提供.

source_string:
Automatically switches to the Elytra when falling
and back to the previous chest equipment when landing.
translation:
当玩家腾空时自动切换到鞘翅, 
并在着陆时切换回之前的胸甲

source_string:
Overrides the block reach distance with
the one set in Generic -> blockReachDistance
translation:
覆写方块放置距离, 
需要在 §6[通用功能] -> [覆写方块放置距离]§f 中设置方块放置距离

source_string:
Restricts which blocks you are able to break (manually).
See the corresponding 'blockBreakRestriction*' configs in the Lists category.
translation:
使用自定义的[方块破坏限制]. 
在§6[配置表单] -> [方块破坏限制*]§f更改您的配置

source_string:
When enabled, you can only break blocks in
a grid pattern, with a configurable interval.
To quickly adjust the interval, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
translation:
当启用时, 您只能等距的破坏方块. 
按住快捷键时滚动滑轮可以快速调整设置

source_string:
Enables the Breaking Restriction mode
  (Plane, Layer, Face, Column, Line, Diagonal).
Basically only allows you to break blocks
in those patterns, while holding down the attack key.
translation:
启用破坏范围限制时, 将你挖掘的范围限制在
(一个水平面、直线、平面、对角线、棱边)上

source_string:
Overrides the default chat background color
with the one from Generics -> 'chatBackgroundColor'
translation: 将聊天栏的背景颜色设置为§6[通用功能] -> [聊天背景颜色]§f中所选择的颜色

source_string:
Stores the text from the chat input text field
and restores it when the chat is opened again
translation: 关闭聊天栏时不会将已输入的内容清空, 而是作为草稿保存
在每一条信息前显示信息发送的时间

source_string:
Adds extra fields to the Command Block GUI, for settings
the name of the command block, and seeing the stats results
translation: 在命令方块的GUI中添加额外的部分, 用于设置命令方块的名称, 并查看运行结果

source_string:
Adds custom items to item groups.
See Lists -> 'creativeExtraItems' to control which items are added to the groups.
Note: Currently these will be added to the Transportation group
(because it has the least items), but in the future
the groups will be configurable per added item
translation:
将自定义物品添加到物品组中. 
请参阅 §6[配置表单] -> [创造额外物品]§f 以控制添加到组中的物品. 
注意: 目前这些物品将被添加到[交通运输]物品栏中(因为它的物品最少), 
但将来这些组将可以根据添加的物品进行配置

source_string:
Allows adding custom flat world presets to the list.
The presets are defined in Lists -> flatWorldPresets
translation:
开启此选项后会在§6[生成世界] -> [超平坦] -> [预设]§f中添加自定义的预设. 
自定义预设可在§6[配置表单] -> [自定义世界预设]§f中编辑添加

source_string:
Allows changing the fly deceleration in creative or spectator mode.
This is mainly meant for faster deceleration ie. less "glide"
when releasing the movement keys.
See Generic -> flyDecelerationRampValue
translation:
允许在创造模式或旁观者模式下改变飞行减速程度, 
这主要用于加快减速. 当松开移动键时, 将减少滑翔的距离

source_string:
Allows using a custom GUI scale for any inventory screen.
See Generic -> §ecustomInventoryGuiScale§r for the scale value
translation: 允许自定义容器界面缩放比例. 缩放值可以在这里调整: §6[通用功能] -> [自定义容器比例]§r

source_string:
Allows locking the real player rotations while holding the 'elytraCamera' activation key.
The controls will then only affect the separate 'camera rotations' for the rendering/camera.
Meant for things like looking down/around while elytra flying nice and straight.
translation:
启用此功能后需要在§6[通用功能快捷键] -> [环顾四周]§f中设定激活快捷键. 
按住此快捷键会锁定玩家当前的视角方向, 
使玩家鼠标输入仅改变摄像机视角而不改变移动方向. 
这让玩家能够在飞行环顾四周, 观赏风景

source_string:
Overrides the entity reach distance with
the one set in Generic -> entityReachDistance
translation:
覆写实体交互距离, 
需要在 §6[通用功能] -> [覆写实体交互距离]§f 中设置实体交互距离

source_string:
Restricts which entities you are able to attack (manually).
See the corresponding 'entityAttackRestriction*' configs in the Lists category.
translation:
手动限制可以攻击的实体. 
请参阅§6[通用功能] -> [实体攻击规则限制类型]§f

source_string:
Enables empty Shulker Boxes stacking up to 64.
NOTE: They will also stack inside inventories!
On servers this will cause desyncs/glitches
unless the server has a mod that does the same.
In single player this changes shulker box based system behaviour.
translation:
允许空潜影盒堆叠, 数量最多为 64 个 
注意: 它们也会在背包中堆叠! 
在服务器上, 除非服务器安装了相同功能的模组, 否则会导致数据不同步或出现故障. 
在单人游戏中, 这会改变潜影盒的系统行为

source_string:
If enabled, then all explosion particles will use the
EXPLOSION_NORMAL particle instead of possibly
the EXPLOSION_LARGE or EXPLOSION_HUGE particles
translation:
启用后, 所有爆炸的粒子效果将使用"中等"体积的粒子, 
而不产生"大型"和"巨型"体积的粒子. 
这能在大量TNT爆炸时提高你的帧数

source_string: Enables always rendering the F3 screen cursor
translation: 启用后屏幕准心为按住F3时的样式

source_string:
Enables "fake sneaking" ie. prevents you from falling from edges
without slowing down the movement speed
translation: 启用后, 你将不会从方块边缘落下, 类似潜行但不会降低移动速度

source_string:
This tweak offsets the click position to the adjacent air block
from the block that you actually click on.
This basically allows you to place blocks against blocks
that have a click action, such as opening inventory GUIs,
without having to sneak. Note that this doesn't not actually
fake sneaking in any way, just the apparent effect is similar.
translation:
该功能将你的点击位置从可交互的方块上调整到了他旁边的空气上, 
这让你可以在可交互的方块旁边直接放置方块而不打开交互界面. 
注意: 这不是真正的伪潜行, 只是看上去效果一样

source_string:
Enables fast/convenient block placement when moving
the cursor over new blocks
translation:
启用[方块快速放置]功能. 
该功能拥有多种限制器, 可以在§6[通用功能快捷键]§f中查看热键设置(默认为Z+1~6)

source_string:
Enables automatic fast left clicking while holding down
the attack button (left click).
The number of clicks per tick is set in the Generic configs.
translation:
可以在一游戏刻中点击多次左键. 
点击速度可在§6[通用功能]§f中进行设置

source_string:
Enables automatic fast right clicking while holding down
the use button (right click).
The number of clicks per tick is set in the Generic configs.
translation:
可以在一游戏刻中点击多次右键. 
点击速度可在§6[通用功能]§f中进行设置

source_string:
Enables overriding the /fill and /clone command
block limits in single player.
The new limit can be set in the Generic configs,
in the 'fillCloneLimit' config value
translation:
启用在单人游戏中覆写 /fill 和 /clone 命令的方块数量限制. 
新的限制可以在§6[通用功能] -> [填充方块上限]§f中设置

source_string:
Enables overriding the fly speed in creative or spectator mode
and using some presets for it
translation:
开启后可以调整飞行速度, 包括创造模式、旁观者、灵魂出窍时的飞行速度. 
此功能拥有4个预设槽, 可在§6[通用功能]§f中设置. 
槽位切换快捷键需要在§6[通用功能快捷键]§f中进行设置, 默认为空

source_string:
Enables placing blocks in different orientations
or with an offset, while holding down the
hotkeys for those modes.
translation:
按住此功能快捷键时, 可以以不同的方向或角度放置方块. 
快捷键可在§6[通用功能快捷键]§f中进行设置, 默认为Ctrl&Alt

source_string:
Enables a free camera mode, similar to spectator mode,
but where the player will remain in place where
you first activate the free camera mode
translation:
启用灵魂出窍后, 你可以在身边随意控制视角, 就像旁观者一样. 
此功能在§6[通用功能]§f内有两个附属选项

source_string:
Overrides the video settings gamma value with
the one set in the Generic configs
translation:
启用后会将Gamma覆写为设定值, 当Gamma大于10时即可实现无限夜视的效果. 
覆写值可于§6[通用功能] -> [伽马值设定]§f设定. 
(gamma也叫灰度系数, 是亮度和对比度的辅助功能)

source_string:
Enables swapping a new stack to the main or the offhand
when the previous stack runs out
translation:
启用后会在当前物品将使用完前自动补充一组新物品手上. 
此功能在§6[通用功能]§f内有两个附属设置

source_string:
Allows not targeting hangable entities (Item Frames and Paintings).
The Generic -> hangableEntityBypassInverse option can be used to control
whether you must be sneaking or not sneaking to be able to target the entity.
translation:
启用此功能将改变玩家与悬挂类实体(展示框和画)的交互方式. 
开启后默认忽略与悬挂类实体的交互, 
可在§6[通用功能] -> [悬挂实体交互方式]§f设置与悬挂类实体的交互方法

source_string: Emulates holding down the attack button
translation: 模拟长按攻击键的效果

source_string: Emulates holding down the use button
translation: 模拟长按使用键的效果

source_string: Enables the hotbar swapping via scrolling feature
translation: 可以通过滚动功能调节物品栏

source_string:
Enables cycling the selected hotbar slot after each placed
block, up to the set max slot number.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
translation:
此功能会在放置方块后循环选中下一格物品栏. 
你可以在§6[通用功能]§f中设置循环范围上限. 
要快速调整该值, 请在按住该快捷键的同时滚动鼠标

source_string:
Enables randomizing the selected hotbar slot after each placed
block, up to the set max slot number.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
translation:
此功能会在放置方块后随机选中一格物品栏. 
你可以在§6[通用功能]§f中设置随机范围上限. 
要快速调整该值, 请在按住该快捷键的同时滚动鼠标

source_string: Enables the hotbar swapping via hotkeys feature
translation: 通过在§6[通用功能快捷键]§f中设置的快捷键来快速切换背包与物品栏

source_string:
Enables an inventory preview while having the cursor over
a block or an entity with an inventory and holding down
the configured hotkey.
§6Deprecated in favor of the 1.21+ MiniHUD version
translation:
当光标悬停在具有物品栏的方块或实体上并按住配置的快捷键时, 启用物品栏预览. 
§c已弃用, 在1.21+版本的 MiniHUD 中已经实现了此功能§f

source_string:
If enabled, then items configured in Lists -> unstackingItems
won't be allowed to spill out when using.
This is meant for example to prevent throwing buckets
into lava when filling them.
translation:
启用后在背包已满时你将不会制造新的不可堆叠物品. 
例如: 在你收集岩浆桶时, 他可以避免背包满时丢出岩浆桶. 
可在§6[配置表单] -> [不可堆叠物品保护]§f中设置不可堆叠物品列表

source_string:
If enabled, then the level of Respiration and Aqua Affinity enchantments,
and having the Fire Resistance effect active,
will greatly increase the visibility under lava.
translation:
如果启用该功能, 
在防火状态下, 根据水下呼吸和水下速掘附魔的等级, 
增加岩浆下的能见度

source_string:
If enabled, then holding shift over maps in an inventory
will render a preview of the map
translation: 启用后, 在背包内按下shift可以预览地图

source_string:
If enabled, then opposite movement keys won't cancel each other,
but instead the last pressed key is the active input.
translation:
启用此功能后, 同时按下两个反方向的移动键时, 
将不再相互抵消, 而是向后输入的方向移动

source_string:
Enables periodic attacks (left clicks)
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicAttackInterval
translation: 启用周期性单击左键功能, 单击左键的时间间隔可以在§6[通用功能] -> [单击左键间隔]§f中调整

source_string:
Enables periodic uses (right clicks)
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicUseInterval
translation: 启用周期性单击右键功能, 单击右键的时间间隔可以在§6[通用功能] -> [单击右键间隔]§f中调整

source_string:
Enables periodically holding attack for a configurable amount of time.
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicHoldAttackInterval
and the duration in periodicHoldAttackDuration
§6Note: You should not use the normal hold attack
§6or the periodic attack at the same time
translation:
在一定的时间内保持按住左键状态. 
在§6[通用功能]->[左键按住间隔]§f 中配置时间间隔, 
在§6[左键按住时间]§f中配置持续时间. 
§6注意: 请不要同时使用长按左键或左键连点§f

source_string:
Enables periodically holding use for a configurable amount of time.
Configure the interval in Generic -> periodicHoldUseInterval
and the duration in periodicHoldUseDuration
§6Note: You should not use the normal hold use
§6or the periodic use at the same time
translation:
在一定的时间内保持按住右键状态. 
在§6[通用功能]->[右键按住间隔]§f 中配置时间间隔, 
在§6[右键按住时间]§f中配置持续时间. 
§6注意: 请不要同时使用长按右键或右键连点§f

source_string: If enabled, the player will be sneaking the entire time
translation:
启用后会一直保持潜行状态. 
§6注意: 此功能为货真价实的潜行, 会降低移动速度. §f
§e不降低移动速度的功能为§e[伪潜行]§f

source_string: If enabled, the player will be always sprinting when moving forward
translation: 如果启用, 玩家将会一直保持奔跑状态

source_string:
When enabled, you can only place blocks in
a grid pattern, with a configurable interval.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
translation:
启用后, 您只能等距的破坏方块. 
按住快捷键时滚动滑轮可以快速调整间距

source_string:
When enabled, you can only place a set number
of blocks per use/right click.
To quickly adjust the value, scroll while
holding down the tweak toggle keybind.
translation:
启用后, 每次放置只可以放置一定数量的方块. 
单次放置方块的数量限制可以在§6[通用功能] -> [放置数量限制]§f进行修改, 
按住快捷键时滚动滑轮可以快速调整限制数量

source_string:
Enables the Placement Restriction mode
  (Plane, Layer, Face, Column, Line, Diagonal)
translation:
启用放置范围限制时, 将你能放置方块的范围限制在
(水平面、直线、平面、对角线、棱边)上

source_string:
Restricts block placement so that you can only
place blocks against the same block type
you first clicked on
translation: 限制方块的放置位置, 你只能将方块放置在第一次点击的相同方块上

source_string:
Restricts block placement so that you can only
place blocks against the same block type
you are holding in your hand
translation: 限制方块的放置位置, 你只能将方块放置在与手中持有的方块类型相同的方块上

source_string:
Enables a player inventory peek/preview, while holding the
configured hotkey key for it.
translation: 开启后你可以使用§6[容器预览]§f快捷键预览玩家背包.

source_string:
Prints a warning message to the hotbar when
non-ambient potion effects are about to run out
translation: 当非信标效果即将消失时, 在物品栏上方显示警报提醒

source_string:
Enables printing the player's coordinates to chat on death.
This feature is originally from usefulmod by nessie.
translation:
开启后在你死亡时会在聊天栏发送死亡坐标, 此坐标仅自己可见. 
这个功能最初来源于nessie的usefulmod

source_string:
If enabled, then before each block placement, the same block
is switched to hand that you are placing against
translation: 开启后, 在每次放置方块之前, 手中会自动切换为与当前右键点击方块相同的方块

source_string:
If enabled, then the player list is always rendered without
having to hold down the key (tab by default)
translation: 如果启用, 玩家列表将会一直显示而不需要按住按键(默认为TAB)

source_string:
Allows the edge-most client-loaded chunks to render.
Vanilla doesn't allow rendering chunks that don't have
all the adjacent chunks loaded, meaning that the edge-most chunk
of the client's loaded won't render in vanilla.
§lThis is also very helpful in the Free Camera mode!§r
translation:
允许客户端渲染边缘区域的加载区块. 不允许渲染没有加载的所有相邻块的区块, 
这意味着客户端加载的最边缘区块不会渲染. 这在灵魂出窍模式下也非常有用!

source_string:
When enabled, invisible entities are rendered like
they would be in spectator mode.
translation: 启用后不可见的实体会渲染为类似旁观者的半透明状态

source_string:
Enables limiting the number of certain types of entities
to render per frame. Currently XP Orbs and Item entities
are supported, see Generic configs for the limits.
translation:
启用后可以限制每帧渲染的特定实体的数量. 
渲染数量可以在§6[通用功能]§f中分别进行设置. 
§6目前支持限制经验球和掉落物实体§f

source_string:
If enabled, then fully repaired items held in hand will
be swapped to damaged items that have Mending on them.
translation: 启用此功能时, 会把耐久不满并带有经验修补的装备自动切换到手中

source_string: Allows modifying the Sculk Sensor pulse length. Set the pulse length in Generic -> sculkSensorPulseLength
translation: 允许修改幽匿传感器的脉冲距离. 在§6[通用功能] -> [调整潜声植物脉冲距离]§f 设置脉冲距离

source_string:
Use Server Data Syncer for entities such as Shulker Boxes,
which allows inventoryPreview to work on servers.
§6You must be an operator of the server or install server-side
§6mods to make the syncer work even this option is set to true.
translation:
使用服务器数据同步器处理潜影盒等实体, 
使[容器浏览]在服务器上也能工作. 
§6即使该选项设置为 true, 你也必须是服务器管理员或安装服务器端模组(Servux)才能使同步器工作

source_string:
Enables the Shulker Box contents display when hovering
over them in an inventory and holding shift
translation: 鼠标悬停在背包中的潜影盒上时, 按下shift将可以预览潜影盒中的内容

source_string:
When enabled, placed signs will use the text from
the previously placed sign.
Can be combined with tweakNoSignGui to quickly place copies
of a sign, by enabling that tweak after making the first sign.
translation:
开启后放置告示牌时将自动填充上一个告示牌的文本本. 
该功能可以与§6[禁用类功能] -> [禁用告示牌GUI]§f配合使用, 
在放置第一个告示牌后启用该功能, 可以快速放置第一个告示牌的副本

source_string: Enabled a snap aim tweak, to make the player face to pre-set exact yaw rotations
translation:
启用瞄准辅助后, 玩家的视角每次只能移动预先设置的角度(默认为45度)
角度可以在§6[通用功能]§f中进行更改

source_string:
Enables a snap aim lock, locking the yaw and/or pitch rotations
to the currently snapped value
translation:
启用后会锁定玩家视角的水平移动. 
§6该功能需要开启[瞄准辅助]后才能生效§f
恢复了1.15.2的潜行行为

source_string:
Allows spectators to teleport to other spectators.
This is originally from usefulmod by nessie.
translation:
启用后你可以在旁观者模式时传送到其他旁观者的位置上. 
该功能来源于nessie的useful mod中

source_string:
Allows overriding the structure block limit.
The new limit is set in Generic -> structureBlockMaxSize
translation:
允许覆写结构方块范围限制. 
新的限制在§6[通用功能] -> [结构方块范围上限]§f 中设置

source_string:
If enabled, then any damageable items held in the hand that
are about to break will be swapped to fresh ones
translation: 开启此功能后, 耐久将要耗尽的工具会被替换为更高耐久的工具

source_string:
If enabled, then tab-completing coordinates while not
looking at a block, will use the player's position
instead of adding the ~ character.
translation:
开启此功能后, 在坐标补全时如果准心没有指向方块, 
则会使用玩家坐标补全而不是相对坐标(~ ~ ~)

source_string: Enables automatically switching to an effective tool for the targeted block
translation: 开启后将根据挖掘的方块自动切换工具

source_string: Enables automatically switching to a weapon for the targeted entity
translation: 开启后将根据攻击的实体自动切换武器

source_string:
Mirrors the targeted y-position within the block bounds.
This is basically for placing slabs or stairs
in the opposite top/bottom state from normal,
if you have to place them against another slab for example.
translation:
启用后按下快捷键时, 方块将放置为Y轴对称的形式. 
这功能主要是为了放置上下相反的半砖和楼梯. 
快捷键默认为空, 需要在§6[通用功能快捷键] -> [Y轴镜像放置]§f中设置

source_string: Enables using the zoom hotkey to, well, zoom in
translation: 启用望远镜功能, 需要在§6[通用功能快捷键] -> [启用望远镜]§f中设置快捷键来使用望远镜
禁用类功能
修复
通用功能
通用功能快捷键
配置表单
方块放置模式
工具
命名
循环: §a打开
循环: §c关闭
循环

source_string: Whether or not multiple triggers per game tick are allowed
translation: 是否允许每个Tick内进行多次触发
自动

Tweakeroo 设置界面 - %s

开启快捷键切换

source_string:
§6Note: This feature works either at all or§r
§6at least fully only in single player§r
translation:
§6注意: 此功能要么完全无法运行§r
§6或者至少只能在单人游戏中运行§r
俯仰角与水平角
俯仰角
水平角
§6你死亡了§r @ [§b%d, %d, %d§r] 在 §a%s
§6聚焦§f 游戏(获取光标)

source_string: §6!! WARNING - %s potion effect(s) about to run out in %s seconds !!§r
translation: §6警告: %s 种药水效果将于 %s 秒后消失!!§r

source_string: Swapped a repairable item to %s slot
translation: 将可修复的物品移至第 %s 格中
将快速点击的次数修改为 %s
设置破坏范围 %s
设置破坏模式 %s
调整预设的飞行速度 %s (速度: %s)

source_string: Set fly speed of preset %s to %s
translation: 将飞行速度由 %s 调整至 %s

source_string: Set Hotbar Slot Cycle max slot to %s
translation: 设置快捷栏循环的最大值 %s

source_string: Set Hotbar Slot Randomizer max slot to %s
translation: 设置快捷栏的最大随机栏位至 %s
调整放置区域 %s
方块放置数量限制为 %s
设置方块放置模式为 %s
设置周期性左键间隔为 %s
设置周期性右键间隔为 %s

source_string: Set Periodic Hold Attack Interval to %s
translation: 设置周期性按住左键间隔为 %s

source_string: Set Periodic Hold Use Interval to %s
translation: 设置周期性按住左键间隔为 %s

source_string: Set Snap Aim pitch step to %s
translation: 已将朝向对齐工具的俯仰角度间距设置为 %s

source_string: Set Snap Aim yaw step to %s
translation: 已将朝向对齐工具的旋转角度间距设置为 %s
设置视角范围为 %s
已复制告示牌文字
将俯仰角的朝向角度对齐为 %s
将水平角的朝向角度对齐为 %s

source_string: Swapped a low durability item for one with more durability
translation: 已经将低耐久物品自动切换为高耐久物品

source_string: Swapped a low durability item for a dummy item
translation: 将低耐久物品自动切换为虚拟物品

source_string: Swapped a low durability item off the player's hand
translation: 移除玩家手中的低耐久物品
功能 %s %s
切换连点器 %s, 点击频率 %s

source_string: Toggled Breaking Grid tweak %s, grid interval: %s
translation: 调整破坏网格区域 %s, 区域范围 %s

source_string: Toggled Fly Speed tweak %s, preset: %s, speed: %s
translation: 调整飞行速度为 %s, 初始速度 %s, 当前速度 %s
切换快速放置模式 %s, 模式为 %s
功能 %s %s, 速度: %s

source_string: Toggled Placement Grid tweak %s, grid interval: %s
translation: 调整放置网格区域 %s, 区域范围 %s
调整放置数量 %s, 数量为 %s

source_string: Toggled Hotbar Slot Cycle tweak %s, max slot: %s
translation: 切换快捷栏循环为 %s, 最大栏位为 %s

source_string: Toggled Hotbar Slot Randomizer tweak %s, max slot: %s
translation: 切换快捷栏随机为 %s, 最大栏位为 %s

source_string: Toggled Yaw & Pitch Snap Aim %s, with yaw step %s, pitch step %s
translation: 对齐水平与俯仰角度 %s, 水平角度步进为 %s, 俯仰角度步进为 %s

source_string: Toggled Pitch Snap Aim %s, with pitch step size %s degrees
translation: 对齐俯仰角度为 %s, 角度步进为 %s

source_string: Toggled Yaw Snap Aim %s, with yaw step size %s degrees
translation: 对齐水平角度为 %s, 角度步进为 %s
